steps.title: Two different hand signs represent phone calls, depending on generation.
steps.content: Two different hand signs represent phone calls, depending on generation. Elder Gen Z individuals, along with older generations like millennials and Gen Xers, will indicate a phone call by holding a fist to their ear with their thumb and pinky extended. Therefore, they keep their hand completely flat and simply raise it to their ear.
